title: The Reckoning Broadcast
outcome: A forgotten Council channel activates, playing an interactive message recorded by Halden. He details secrets behind the BCI and frames his death as a final test of civic maturity. Citizens must collectively choose—bring back BCI, adopt new governance, or risk total dismantling. The city holds its first open referendum, reshaping its future.

events.description: A dormant Council broadcast channel comes to life, displaying Halden's pre-recorded address citywide.
Halden's message reveals the BCI's true design and offers the city a direct choice: restore it, build something new, or end automated rule.
Debates erupt across assemblies. People confront the costs of systemic control, personal freedom, and historic injustices linked to the BCI.
A citywide, secure referendum is held. Citizens vote openly on the future of the BCI and automated governance.
Results are announced: the people opt for a transparent, assembly-driven governance model and permanent sunset of the BCI. The city enters a new era of direct, collective decision-making.
